channel.title: Crt on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Crt on TLDRBins

item.title: Openssl
item.description: Show TLS Certificate echo | openssl s_client -showcerts -servername 10.10.11.10 -connect 10.10.11.10:443 2>/dev/null | openssl x509 -inform pem -noout -text Base64 Encode/Decode # base64 encode a file openssl base64 -in ./file # base64 decode a file and output to a file cat b64_file | openssl enc -d -base64 -out ./file Certificate Show content of a request openssl req -in request.csr -noout -text Create Client Certificate # Generate a user key openssl genrsa -out username.
